info.title: Service Cancellation Reason - Read
info.description: This API enables you to retrieve the customizing entries for service cancellation reason like C001, C002, and so on and also provides its corresponding language text.

x-sap-shortText: Read Service Cancellation Reason using this synchronous inbound service

values.text: [Service Order Management and Monitoring(3D2)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/3D2 " Link To BP ")

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_BatchRequests).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

multipart/mixed;boundary=request-separat.example:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET ServiceCancellationReason HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

multipart/mixed.example:
--response-separator
Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--
